original_text: As for the mystery of the seven stars that you saw in my right hand, and the seven golden lampstands, the seven stars are the angels of the seven churches, and the seven lampstands are the seven churches.
korean_text: 네가 본 것은 내 오른손의 일곱 별의 비밀과 또 일곱 금 촛대라 일곱 별은 일곱 교회의 사자요 일곱 촛대는 일곱 교회니라

sentences.original_text: As for the mystery of the seven stars
that you saw in my right hand
the seven stars are the angels of the seven churches
and the seven lampstands are the seven churches
